game.name: 白銀のユークロニア
game.categories: Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ”Silver Eucronia” is an exploration RPG where you wander through a post-apocalyptic world covered in white. Through interactions with allies, world exploration, and deadly battles against threats, you will witness the conclusion of your own world and carve out the future beyond.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ”Silver Eucronia” is an exploration RPG where you wander through a post-apocalyptic world covered in white. Through interactions with allies, world exploration, and deadly battles against threats, you will witness the conclusion of your own world and carve out the future beyond.
